com.deezer.sdk.player

Class ArtistRadioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deezer.sdk.player.AbstractPlayerWrapper
      • com.deezer.sdk.player.ArtistRadioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerWrapper
    Deprecated. 
    The Deezer Radios are now unified in a single model, and can all be played using the RadioPlayer.

    @Deprecated
public final class ArtistRadioPlayer
extends com.deezer.sdk.player.AbstractPlayerWrapper
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Artist's Smart Radio.

    An ArtistRadioPlayer can be launched very easily using the follonwing code : 

     
      ArtistRadioPlayer artistRadioPlayer = new ArtistRadioPlayer(application, deezerConnect, 
                  new WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker());
      artistRadioPlayer.addPlayerListener(radioListener);
      artistRadioPlayer.playArtistRadio(artistId);

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArtistRadioPlayer

        public ArtistRadioPlayer(Application application,
                         DeezerConnect deezerConnect,
                         NetworkStateChecker networkStateChecker)
                  throws TooManyPlayersExceptions,
                         DeezerError
        Deprecated. 
        Creates an autonomous ArtistRadioPlayer. No parameter can be null
        Parameters:
        application - the current application
        deezerConnect - a deezerConnect object initialised to be used with Deezer Radio
        networkStateChecker - a component able to monitor network availability.
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersExceptions - thrown when Player cannot be created because too many other players are still alived
        DeezerError - if deezerConnect is not properly initialized otherwise

      • skipToNextTrack

        public boolean skipToNextTrack()
        Deprecated. 
        Asks the player to skip to the next track
        Returns:
        if the player skipped to the next track. If the current track is the last of the list, or if skipping is not allowed, then false is returned

      • skipToPreviousTrack

        public boolean skipToPreviousTrack()
        Deprecated. 
        Asks the player to skip to the previous track
        Returns:
        if the player skipped to the next track. If the current track is the first of the list, or if skipping is not allowed, then false is returned
